title: Ryuubi Tokuko wa Shizuka ni Kurashitai
original_name: 劉備徳子は静かに暮らしたい
sinopse: The heroes of the three kingdoms' war have been reincorporated in high school girls! Loyalty and hostility concern love in this world...? Wei, Wu, Shu, during the Three Kingdoms period they were warriors who fell in the mind and fell down in the chest... But what do they do in Japan?!
